title: Hide 'n Seek gametype
body: Riot needs to either bring back dominion for custom games or create a rotating game type for it, it was amazing to play and the loss of it makes the game feel like its missing something special

replies.body: I think the population is dying too fast for this.

Nobody really played dominion, that's why they removed it.

But a rotating gamemode for hide and seek wouldn't be too bad
